item.title: Word Suggestion App
item.author: aveek.s98@gmail.com (Aveek Saha)
item.description: We often find ourselves grasping at a word that’s on the tip of our tongue but we just can’t pin it down, or wanting to check the spelling of a word that we’re not sure of.
